pkgmetadata.longdescription: Dose Response Models for Bayesian Model Averaging // Fits dose- response models utilizing a Bayesian model averaging approach as outlined in Gould (2019) doi:10.1002/bimj.201700211 for both continuous and binary responses. Longitudinal dose-response modeling is also supported in a Bayesian model averaging framework as outlined in Payne, Ray, and Thomann (2024) doi:10.1080/10543406.2023.2292214. Functions for plotting and calculating various posterior quantities (e.g. posterior mean, quantiles, probability of minimum efficacious dose, etc.) are also implemented. Copyright Eli Lilly and Company (2019).
